            :time (t / today))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01

                        :ARG1 p2))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (ii4 / imagine-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (k / know-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :mod (a2 / anyway)
                              :mod (a3 / at-least))))))
